title: New York Life Taps Current President Craig DeSanto as Next CEO
sub_head: CEO Ted Mathas to step down in April
body:
New York Life Insurance Co.â€™s longtime chief executive, Ted Mathas, will hand over the reins of the 176-year-old company in April to current president Craig DeSanto.
Mr. Mathas, who has served as CEO for nearly 14 years, will remain chairman of the board in a nonexecutive capacity for a transition period.
